config.desc.defaultMcAssetsPath: directory of vanilla minecraft assets, used for goning to definitions, please use absolute path, the directory should include folder named `minecraft`
config.desc.tipColorForUndefinedTextureV: the tip color for undefined texture variants in model files
command.title.openDefaultMcAssetsPath: McResHelper: open folder of vanilla assets
command.title.createNewResourcePack: McResHelper: create a new pack in current folder
command.title.createNewResourcePackRoot: McResHelper: create a new pack with the current folder as the root directory
